metadata.title: CVE-2022-48740 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:selinux: fix double free of cond_list on error paths On error path fromcond_read_list() and duplicate_policydb_cond_list() the cond_list_destroy()gets called a second time in caller functions, resulting in NULL pointerderef. Fix this by resetting the cond_list_len to 0 in cond_list_destroy(),making subsequent calls a noop. Also consistently reset the cond_listpointer to NULL after freeing. [PM: fix line lengths in the description]

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
